inputs.name: Label
inputs.description: Label value in the Mask Volume to use as the mask

inputs.name: Replace
inputs.description: Value to use for the output volume outside of the mask

inputs.name: OutputVolume
inputs.description: Output volume: Input Volume masked by label value from Mask Volume

description: Masks two images. The output image is set to 0 everywhere except where the chosen label from the mask volume is present, at which point it will retain it's original values. The two images do not have to have the same dimensions.
name: Mask Scalar Volume
label: Mask Scalar Volume
